issue.title: [Python] Improve docs for S3FileSystem / bucket region resolution
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18238](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18238). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Should update the documentation surrounding `S3Filesystem` and how to resolve `region`. ie. `S3FileSystem.from_uri`, `resolve_s3_region(<<bucket>>)`

[R docs \| https://arrow.apache.org/docs/r/articles/fs.html#creating-a-filesystem-object] is a good reference.
